Protocols/VHRequest.html#/s:9VHService9V.name: isSecure
Protocols/VHRequest.html#/s:9VHService9V.abstract: If it is secure scheme will be https otherwise http. Default value is true.

Protocols/VHRequest.html#/s:9VHService9V.name: identifier
Protocols/VHRequest.html#/s:9VHService9V.abstract: Identifier of the task for canceling previous same request when VHService.cancelsPreviousOperations is true. Default value is same as path value.

Protocols/VHServiceEnvironment.html#/s:9.name: acceptableStatusCodes
Protocols/VHServiceEnvironment.html#/s:9.abstract: Acceptable HTTP status codes. Default value is Set(200…299).

Protocols/VHServiceEnvironment.html#/s:9.name: additionalHTTPHeaders
Protocols/VHServiceEnvironment.html#/s:9.abstract: Additinal HTTP headers. Defalt is an empty Dictionary.

Protocols/VHDataLiteralType.html.name: VHDataLiteralType
Protocols/VHDataLiteralType.html.abstract: VHDataLiteralType used for representing any object as a Data.

Protocols/VHRequest.html.name: VHRequest
Protocols/VHRequest.html.abstract: This is a request builder for VHService

Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.name: statusCode(_:)
Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.abstract: When VHServiseEnvironment.acceptableStatusCodes not contains the response status code then this error will be thrown

Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.name: unknown
Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.abstract: When both error and data is nil, this error will be thrown

Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.name: errorDescription
Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.abstract: A localized message describing what error occurred.

Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.name: errorCode
Enums/VHServiceError.html#/s:9VHService0.abstract: The error code within the given domain.

Classes/VHServiceLogger.html#/s:9VHServi.name: logLevel
Classes/VHServiceLogger.html#/s:9VHServi.abstract: VHServiceLogger.log(...) checks this parameter whether to log the message or not.

Classes/VHServiceLogger.html#/s:9VHServi.name: log(_:level:)
Classes/VHServiceLogger.html#/s:9VHServi.abstract: You can use this to log message related toVHServiceLogger.logLevel

Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.name: Completion
Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.abstract: This is the ComponentAPIRequest.send(...) or ComponentAPIRequest.upload(...) completion block type

Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.name: ProgressBlock
Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.abstract: This is the ComponentAPIRequest.download(...) or ComponentAPIRequest.upload(...) progress block type

Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC2.name: cancelsPreviousOperations
Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC2.abstract: If true service cancels the previous task which has same VHHTTPTask.identifier. Default value is true.

Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.name: environment
Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.abstract: Environment of the service. If changed, new environment will only used for the new sended requests.

Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.name: init(environment:)
Classes/VHService.html#/s:9VHServiceAAC1.abstract: You can use Service to send requests
